content: Install dependencies (React Router, Framer Motion, Noto Sans Gujarati font)
Define theme system (colors, typography, spacing) with Gujarati font support
Implement Splash Screen with animations and branding
Create Login/Register/Biometric screen with tabbed interface
Build Home Dashboard with feature cards and stats ribbon
Implement Matrimony Hub with 3 tabs (Profile List, Detail, My Profile)
Create Yogigram Feed with posts, videos, and create post UI
Build Messages Center with chat sections
Implement remaining screens (Trust, Subscription, AI Assistant, Profile, Settings)
Wire up React Router navigation (Bottom Tabs + Stack)
Run production build and verify all screens work
